title: How old was Rick Astley when 'Never Gonna Give You Up' was recorded? - Quora

response.answer_text: Richard Paul Astley (born 6 February 1966) is an English singer, songwriter, musician, and radio personality. His 1987 song, “Never Gonna Give You Up” was a No. 1 hit single in 25 countries. (This was a direct cut and paste from Wikipedia. Sorry…I just had to prove Google was faster this time.)  Oh, so the answer is he was 21 years old. (My math skills work, too!)

Rick Astley’s birthday was 2/6/66. It is believed the session for the track was on New Years Day in 1987. It was just before his 21st birthday. Yes he was very young at the time. I have to give the man credit. Rick rolling became a thing placing his song in unusual spots where you would never expect it. I think it’s great he has been able to laugh at himself. He joined the Foo Fighters on stage for a performance of the song. As you can see, the crowd knew the words.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Brendon Summer, Thales Talton and 1 more
